news.title: Who will Trump pick for Fed chair? Hear from all the candidates in their own words
news.summary: President Trump's short list to replace Jerome Powell as Fed chair has turned into a long list of nearly a dozen possible candidates. President Trump has said he wants to replace Powell with someone with more Wall Street experience.

news.title: DC sues Trump over federal takeover of police force
news.summary: Trump federalizes the police department of Washington, D.C., and orders the deployment of National Guard troops in the capital city. Trump also orders the use of the National Guard to protect the White House.

news.title: Nothing is off the table as Trump and Putin set to meet
news.summary: "Trump wants to exhaust all options to have a peaceful end to war," the White House says. Whether those "options" are good or bad for Ukraine is key.

news.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway reveals new stake in beleaguered insurer UnitedHealth
news.summary: The Omaha, Nebraska-based conglomerate bought more than 5 million shares in the health-care firm for a stake worth about $1.6 billion at the end of June.

news.title: Summer travel isn't as easy as it used to be for airlines
news.summary: Airlines are seeing an earlier drop-off in summer travel as children return to school earlier. Airlines are also seeing an early drop- off in business travel as well.

news.title: Energy traders have already baked Alaska into the price, says BofA strategist. What could come next.
news.summary: Strategist notes S&P 500 price-to-book at record high, that Fed rate cuts threaten the dollar, and that energy bear market could get worse.

news.title: My wife and I are in our 50s and have $11 million. We’re not leaving it to our kids. Is that wrong?
news.summary: “We have retired from full-time work,” says the couple. “We’re not going to do it anymore.” “It’s time to go home.’

news.title: 20 stocks in the S&P 500 that are high achievers this earnings season
news.summary: These companies have shown the largest increases in sales per share while also improving profit margins. These companies have also improved their profit margins by more than 50 per cent.

news.title: ‘I’m tired of corporate America’: My wife and I have $1.65 million. I’m 61. Can I retire already?
news.summary: “My annual income is $108,000,” she says. “I’m not rich, but I’ve got a good life.”

news.title: Can my wife claim spousal Social Security as a permanent resident from Ukraine?
news.summary: “She’s only worked since 2021 and won’t be able to work six more years,’’ says her mother. “She has to stop now.”
